alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 04 at 3:27PM EDT until September 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 95 expected. * WHERE...Lower elevations such as river valleys of Sullivan, Merrimack, Cheshire, Eastern Hillsborough, Interior Rockingham and Western and Central Hillsborough Counties. * WHEN...From noon to 6 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
